alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 2:17PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Showers will increase late afternoon with periods of low visibility in heavy snow expected through the evening. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Bridges may become icy after sunset.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
